editorialSummary.text: Plush quarters in a swanky hotel offering restaurants & bars, plus a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
Truly 5-Star – Worth Every Penny!

We had a bill of around ₹15,000 for our group of three at the restaurant — and honestly, it was worth every rupee. The food, the service, and the ambience completely justify the price.

The terrace lounge stole our hearts — what a stunning view! From the moment we entered, everything felt magical. The rooms are luxurious with polished doors, premium wardrobes, and an absolutely beautiful washroom that feels like a spa. The hall features a gorgeous jhoomar, and there are fresh flowers everywhere, even in the washrooms — such attention to detail!

A special touch: the foreigner lady playing the violin — her music just takes your heart away. Whether it’s the view of the swimming pool or the elegance of every corner, this place delivers a truly unforgettable experience.

Highly recommended for those who want luxury, charm, and class in one place.

text.text:
Exceptional Experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune

Our recent stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune was nothing short of exceptional. We were there to celebrate a special family occasion — my sister’s 40th birthday — and the experience was made truly memorable thanks to the thoughtful and attentive team at the hotel.

From the very beginning, *Jui* ensured everything was seamless. Her efforts in curating surprises and making my sister feel special were deeply appreciated. It’s rare to see this level of care and personal attention, and it meant a lot to all of us.

The hospitality throughout the property was top-notch — warm, inclusive, and genuinely attentive. A special shoutout to *Chetan* and *Rupesh* at *Three Kitchens* restaurant, who made our dining experience wonderful with their kind service and attention to detail.

And our little 7-year-old absolutely loved the experience! He came back with fond memories — and even a sweet little gift from the hotel that he now treasures.

Every element — the comfort, the service, the food, and the warmth — reflected the Ritz-Carlton standard in the best way possible.

editorialSummary.text: Contemporary rooms in an upscale hotel featuring 5 restaurants, a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
This was my third stay at JW Marriott Pune, and the consistently excellent service keeps bringing me back. Check-in was smooth and effortless as always. I appreciated the staff’s warm professionalism and their gracious refusal to accept tips, true hospitality. In-room dining was prompt and beautifully presented. The breakfast buffet is outstanding, with a well-balanced mix of local Maharashtrian favorites and international options.
Staff was ready to go above and beyond to help me recover in my delhi belly episode that I got from outside. Highly recommended for both business and leisure stays.

text.text:
A memorable stay with warm hospitality, but marred by a persistent issue

The hotel itself is lovely — great ambiance, warm hospitality, and excellent restaurants. I truly appreciated the thoughtful upgrade to a suite, which was a wonderful gesture. The personalized welcome in the room — a platter of rose petals, soothing bath salts, and a handwritten note — reflected the attention to detail and care from the housekeeping team.

However, my experience was significantly impacted by the lack of hot water in both the shower and the wash basin. When I say no hot water, I mean completely cold — not even lukewarm. Despite raising the issue twice and following up with a third reminder over a 24-hour period, the problem remained unresolved. I was repeatedly assured it would be fixed, but unfortunately, it wasn't.

To the hotel’s credit, the senior staff at checkout were apologetic and took the time to engage with me about the issue. That said, prevention is better than cure — and when something does go wrong, a prompt resolution is critical. Operational follow-through on customer complaints needs improvement to match the otherwise excellent service standards.

While I was disappointed by this lapse, the overall experience and the staff’s warmth mean I am still likely to return — albeit with the hope that service recovery becomes as strong as the welcome.

The food was another highlight—authentic, delicious, and
thoughtfully curated. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options were available, served alongside a well-rounded dessert selection.

editorialSummary.text: High-end hotel with luxe quarters & 3 stylish restaurants, plus an outdoor pool, a gym & a spa

text.text:
The property itself is beautiful and the service throughout my stay was very good. As a Diamond member I was upgraded to an executive room, which was appreciated, although I had hoped for a suite to truly experience the full Conrad touch. Unlike my experience at the Conrad Bengaluru, there was no welcome note waiting in the room, no small treats or snacks, and the upgrade felt more standard than special.

Breakfast was lively and at times quite busy, but the quality of the food was very good and worth the wait. The rooms were spacious and comfortable, with thoughtful amenities. I especially liked how the power outlets were conveniently placed and adaptable to international standards, which made things much easier as a traveler. The water pressure in the shower was excellent, which is always a welcome detail after a long day.

The hotel is also very conveniently located, making it a great choice for both business and leisure. Overall it was a pleasant stay, but I left wishing there had been a few more of those signature touches that usually set Conrad apart.

text.text:
Our four-day stay at The Westin was our first experience with this esteemed brand, and we arrived with the high expectations that naturally accompany a luxury five-star hotel. Celebrating our anniversary, we were simply looking for a relaxing staycation to unwind and enjoy each other's company.

For the most part, our experience was indeed lovely. The hotel undeniably possesses the hallmarks of a five-star establishment. The food and drinks were a definite highlight, and we particularly enjoyed the extensive breakfast buffet. However, if you're planning a longer stay like ours, be aware that the buffet options might become a tad repetitive. The hotel also boasts excellent amenities, including a spa that we thoroughly enjoyed. Our balcony room was comfortable, featuring an exceptionally comfortable bed and prompt service whenever we requested it. The staff across the hotel were consistently polite and courteous.

However, our stay was unfortunately punctuated by a series of unexpected hiccups that left us somewhat surprised, especially given the hotel's reputation. On one occasion, I was quite taken aback to find a piece of glass in my food during the breakfast buffet. While the staff were quick to apologize and address the situation, it was certainly a concerning incident.

My wife's experience with the salon was also disappointing. Despite enquiring a day in advance about curly hair products for a hair spa, the salon was unable to accommodate her needs. Furthermore, one day our room was missed during the cleaning service, even after we had specifically requested it. On our final night, we requested room service to clean our room upon our return, only to find that while the bed was tidied, the rubbish, trays, and the balcony remained untouched.

Speaking of the balcony, while it was a nice addition to our room, it ultimately felt underwhelming. Furnished with just a simple table and chairs and offering no shade from the intense daytime sun, it was unusable during the day. In the evenings, the abundance of mosquitos made it equally uninviting. The view from our room was also just satisfactory, with nearby buildings obstructing the sunrise.

Despite these issues, I must acknowledge the hotel's commendable service recovery efforts. The staff consistently apologized for each incident and genuinely tried their best to rectify the situations. This proactive approach to service was definitely appreciated.

Ultimately, our anniversary staycation at The Westin Koregaon Park was a blend of positive and negative experiences. While the hotel offers many of the luxuries and services one expects from a five-star establishment, the series of unfortunate incidents we encountered during our short stay was surprising. It leaves us questioning whether it was simply bad luck or if there are underlying inconsistencies. While we appreciated the good aspects like the food, the comfortable room, and the polite staff, and especially their attempts to make things right, the repeated issues did detract from the seamless and relaxing experience we had hoped for. The salon, in particular, could benefit from better-trained staff who are knowledgeable about all the services offered.

text.text:
I’ve stayed at Hyatt Pune a couple of times now, including this year and last. It’s located close to Aga Khan Palace, not too far from the airport or Phoenix Mall, which makes it convenient for work or quick errands. This is an older property compared to the newer Hyatt Pune Residences nearby, and that shows in the interiors. The rooms are spacious, but the dark wood décor makes them feel smaller and almost crampped. Still, they’re well equipped with a study table, high back chairs and footstool, wardrobe, and a clean bathroom unit with shower and sink.

The pool area is nicely done and located next to their spa and salon. The salon is run by Arya, and I’ve used it during work trips it’s great to have those services available when you’re short on time and need something basic for hair or skincare. They also have a Blue Tokai coffee counter in the lobby, which is a plus if you like good coffee and are coming from cities like Bangalore.

The food, however, is something I feel doesn’t quite match up to five-star standards, not just at Hyatt but across many luxury hotels in Pune. That said, the Asian restaurant has a pleasant vibe—especially at night when the water wall is lit up—and the food is decent. One small touch I appreciated was at breakfast, where they placed a tiny glass bowl with a single fish on tables where people were dining alone. It was thoughtful and not something you see often.

Staff is courteous and helpful. Check-in was smooth, and they were proactive in helping with things like flower arrangements when we needed them. Overall, it’s a good property, especially for work trips, with a few thoughtful touches that stand out.

One point to note is that the hotel isn’t fully wheelchair accessible — some areas, like the lounge and restaurants, can only be reached by stairs. However, the staff went above and beyond to help us with my mother, who uses a wheelchair. They were always quick to assist and ensured she was safely brought wherever we needed to go.

The food and service continue to impress, and I would definitely return in the future.

text.text:
The Sheraton Grand Pune is a luxurious hotel located in the vibrant city of Pune, India. This upscale establishment offers a blend of modern amenities and elegant design, making it an ideal choice for both business travelers and vacationers. The hotel features spacious and well-appointed rooms, furnished with contemporary decor and equipped with essential amenities. Guests can enjoy stunning views of the cityscape or the lush greenery surrounding the hotel.

One of the highlights of the Sheraton Grand Pune is its exceptional dining options. The hotel boasts multiple restaurants and bars, serving a variety of cuisines, from traditional Indian dishes to international fare. The buffet breakfast is especially noteworthy, offering a wide range of fresh and delicious items to cater to diverse tastes.

The hotel also provides excellent facilities for business events, including well-equipped meeting rooms and banquet halls, making it a popular choice for corporate gatherings. Additionally, the Sheraton Grand features a luxurious spa, a fitness center, and a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, ensuring guests can unwind and rejuvenate during their stay.

The location of the hotel is another advantage, situated near key attractions, shopping areas, and corporate offices. The attentive and friendly staff further enhances the experience, providing top-notch service and hospitality.

Overall, the Sheraton Grand Pune stands out for its luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and extensive facilities. Whether you're in Pune for business or leisure, this hotel offers a memorable stay with a commitment to excellence, making it a highly recommended choice for travelers.

text.text:
Deeply Disappointed - Unacceptable Hospitality at Amanora The Fern

My experience at Amanora The Fern was incredibly frustrating and disappointing. Across multiple incidents, the lack of professionalism and care from the staff was glaring and what's worse, no real action was taken, even after we brought everything to their attention.

Starting with the food: we ordered breakfast twice, asking for fried eggs and toast. The first time, the bread was not toasted at all. The second time, it came burnt. I had also asked for a portion of mushrooms, which arrived soaked in water, making them completely inedible. The tea was cold both times, we ended up not touching the food at all.

Later that night, we ordered a brownie and confirmed with the chef that it contained no nuts, as I have a nut allergy. He assured us it didn’t. But when the brownie arrived, it was filled with nuts. I had an allergic reaction and had to take medication in the middle of the night. This level of carelessness is unacceptable and honestly dangerous.

The worst, however, was the blatant violation of privacy. Despite the Do Not Disturb sign being on, the staff kept knocking, ringing the bell and even entered the room while I was inside alone and in the washroom. This is absolutely unacceptable behaviour.

To top it off, the next morning at 8 a.m the housekeeping woke us up by knocking and ringing the bell again, saying it was checkout time. Our checkout wasn’t due yet and they later admitted it was a mistake meant for another room.

Even after all of these incidents not a single manager checked in with us. No one attempted to take responsibility or offer any kind of gesture not even a complimentary item, discount or genuine effort to fix things. Just a casual “sorry” during checkout, as if all of this was normal.

I find this level of service shocking from a hotel under The Fern brand. The staff clearly lacks training, professionalism and basic courtesy. I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone. Completely unacceptable experience. Please save yourself the money and time!!!!!

text.text:
Our stay at Amanora The Fern was nothing short of magical, a night that will forever be etched in our hearts as the best of our lives. The service was impeccable, delivered with such genuine warmth and attentiveness that it felt like the staff were personally invested in making our moment unforgettable. They went above and beyond, surprising us with a bottle of chilled champagne and two elegant glasses as per our special request, and the beautifully decorated bed was a touching masterpiece that made our hearts skip a beat. Every interaction with the team was infused with kindness, transforming our stay into the perfect start to a new chapter.

The food was an absolute delight, elevating our experience to new heights. The chicken stroganoff was a creamy, savory triumph, perfectly balanced and bursting with flavor in every bite. The hot chocolate was a warm, indulgent hug in a mug, rich and comforting, exactly what we needed to cozy up our evening. The rasmalai was divine—soft, spongy, and soaked in a delicately sweet saffron-infused milk that melted in our mouths. And the scoop of vanilla ice cream? Silky, classic, and the perfect sweet note to end our meal. Each dish was crafted with care, making every bite a celebration of taste and texture.

Our room, with its stunning view of the vibrant boulevard, was the ideal backdrop to this unforgettable night. Amanora The Fern didn’t just provide a stay; they created a memory we’ll never let slip from our minds. To the exceptional team, thank you for your outstanding service, culinary brilliance, and for making our night so extraordinarily special. We’ll return, not just for the luxury, but for the love and care you pour into every detail.

text.text:
A perfect place to relax and unwind in North Goa!
Our stay was truly exceptional. The property offers great amenities including an in-house gym, spa, and a variety of delicious food options. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and well-maintained.

What really stood out was the outstanding room service—we were pleasantly surprised when they arranged a birthday cake for one of our group members. The staff is extremely professional and courteous, with a special mention to Debopriya for her warm hospitality and attention to detail.

Highly recommended for anyone looking to have a relaxing and memorable stay in North Goa!

text.text:
Stayed at Novotel and it truly lives up to its brand reputation. The room was clean, well-lit, and had a warm, welcoming vibe. The bed was super cozy, and the TV came loaded with all the popular subscriptions — perfect for unwinding. There's a mini fridge, a nice bathroom with a great shower, and the view from the room was just beautiful. Although the room size is quite small but it's good. There are other packages which provide different rooms.

Breakfast was complimentary and surprisingly good — plenty of options to choose from. The pool is a nice addition, but keep in mind it’s open only until 7 PM. They also offer helpful amenities like laundry service, a weighing machine, and more.

Location-wise, it’s spot on. Ramwadi Metro Station is right in front, and getting a cab is never a problem. Plus, you're close to food streets and malls, which is super convenient. Overall, a comfortable and pleasant stay!

text.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ | Exceptional Hospitality at The Orchid Hotel

The Orchid Hotel truly exceeded all expectations — a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and outstanding service. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel welcome with their warm hospitality and professional demeanor.

The rooms were impeccably clean, spacious, and well-appointed with everything needed for a comfortable stay. Every detail, from the bedding to the amenities, reflected the hotel’s high standards.

What stood out most was the exceptional service — the staff went above and beyond to ensure every request was handled promptly and with a smile. Whether it was front desk assistance, room service, or dining staff, their attention to detail and genuine care made our stay truly memorable.

The food was also a delight — fresh, flavorful, and served in a beautiful setting. Whether dining at the restaurant or enjoying breakfast, everything was top-notch.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay. The Orchid Hotel delivers the best in class, and I will definitely be returning!

text.text:
Overall, a nice stay with great hospitality.

I wouldn’t miss the chance to thank the hotel manager for helping me out of an unpleasant situation. When I first entered my room, there was a strong, unpleasant odor. I reported it to the reception, and while they tried to fix it with a room spray, it didn’t help much. Later, I figured out the smell was coming from the carpet. Upon raising the issue again, they quickly shifted me to another room with tiled flooring. That room was much better, and I could enjoy the rest of my stay comfortably.

Also, I must mention, the food was absolutely awesome, especially the vegetarian options. No doubt, the food was a highlight of the stay!

text.text:
We wasted our weekend at Oxford Gold Resort and I'm still fuming about it. A 1-star rating is generous for this dump.

Let's break it down:

We walked into this supposed "5-star" resort expecting luxury, but what we got was a joke. No lobby? Are you kidding me? All the activities, pool, and restaurant are 200m away uphill, and don't even get me started on the lack of transportation services. What about seniors? Did you even think about them?

The food at the clubhouse restaurant was disgusting. We waited forever for a table, and when we finally got our food, it was a letdown. And don't even get me started on the swimming pool. We get there and they're telling us we need a cap, which nobody informed us about earlier. And of course, they've got a shop selling them for 200 bucks each. What a rip-off!

But the cherry on top was when our car got punctured during checkout. We asked the staff for help, and they couldn't care less. No emergency services, no nothing. We had to struggle to find a mechanic, and after 3 hours, we finally managed to get one. And guess what? The hotel staff took his number for "future reference". Unbelievable.

Avoid this resort like the plague. The management clearly doesn't care about their guests.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of celebrating a special birthday with a cake crafted by Chef Sarita at Sayaji Hotel, and it was truly a memorable experience. The cake was not only visually stunning but also absolutely delicious. Every detail, from the intricate decorations to the perfectly balanced flavors, reflected Chef Sarita’s exceptional skill and passion for baking.

The sponge was light, moist, and fresh, while the frosting was rich without being overly sweet — a perfect harmony that everyone at the party raved about. You could tell that only the finest ingredients were used, and the personalized touches made the celebration even more special.

Chef Sarita’s professionalism and creativity truly made the birthday unforgettable. I would highly recommend her cakes for any special occasion – they are a masterpiece in both taste and presentation!

Thank you, Chef Sarita and Sayaji Hotel, for making the day so special.

text.text:
I stayed at Crowne Plaza Pune for a business trip and found it to be a reasonable choice in terms of value for money. The pricing is fair, the location is convenient, and the rooms are quite spacious—ideal for business travelers.

However, the hotel does show signs of wear, and cleanliness was a concern—there was noticeable dust in the room, along with some leftover hair from previous guests.

Breakfast was average, offering both Indian and continental options, but the ingredients didn’t seem particularly fresh. Additionally, the gym is quite basic and could benefit from an upgrade.

On a positive note, the overall staff was polite and attentive, providing a friendly and accommodating service.

While the hotel offers a good location and reasonable pricing, improvements in cleanliness and amenities would enhance the experience.

text.text:
I appreciated the staff and their responsiveness in addressing our concerns quickly, and the lobby/reception area was welcoming (generally, top marks for the staff). Unfortunately, the overall state of the building was disappointing. We stayed on the 8th, 7th, and 4th floors, and each floor had a strong sewage odor (one room also smelled of cigarette smoke). Attempts to mask the smell with oils and fragrances only made it worse—walking through the hallways often left us feeling nauseous.

Given that the Crowne Plaza is positioned as a 5-star property competing with the Conrad and Sheraton nearby, the infrastructure does not meet that standard. The guest room flooring, bathroom shelving, elevators, and hallways are in clear need of refurbishment. At minimum, the plumbing system needs urgent attention.

The staff can only do so much; the real issue lies with the upkeep of the property. Until meaningful upgrades are made, we would not choose to stay here again

editorialSummary.text: Modern rooms in a upmarket hotel offering free Wi-Fi & breakfast, plus 3 restaurants & a pool.

text.text:
Team Lunch Review – Four Points by Sheraton

We recently had a team lunch at Four Points by Sheraton and overall, it was a great experience. The ambiance was elegant and comfortable, providing a perfect setting for a relaxed team gathering.

We opted for the buffet lunch, which had a good spread of dishes. The food was delicious and well-presented, and everyone appreciated the variety available in the main course and desserts.

However, there are a couple of areas for improvement. The vegetarian starter options were limited, and we would have appreciated a bit more variety for our vegetarian team members. Also, the refilling time for a few dishes was slightly slow, which caused a bit of a wait during peak lunch hour.

That said, the staff was courteous and responsive, and we enjoyed the overall experience. With a few small tweaks, it could be even better. Would still recommend for team lunches and group outings.

text.text:
Attended a wedding reception at Four Points by Sheraton in Pune, and while the venue impressed with its elegant décor and spacious banquet hall, the overall experience was mixed.

1. Ambience & Decor: The venue was beautifully arranged for the wedding, with tasteful lighting and seating that gave a premium feel. It’s an excellent space for large gatherings and special occasions.

2. Service: The staff were courteous and well-coordinated, ensuring guests were attended to promptly. The hospitality was professional throughout the event.

3. Food Quality: This was the most underwhelming part of the evening. The food didn’t quite live up to expectations, especially for a venue of this standard. Flavors were average and lacked the richness you typically expect at a high-end wedding buffet.

4. Location & Accessibility: Conveniently located in Viman Nagar, it’s easily accessible from the airport and other parts of the city, with ample parking space.

Overall, it’s a stylish venue ideal for upscale events, but there’s definitely room for improvement in the food department.

text.text: I had an amazing experience during my stay at this hotel. Right from the moment I arrived, the front office team, especially Akanksha and her team, made me feel truly welcome. They were not just polite and professional but also very attentive, taking care of every little detail to ensure my stay was smooth and comfortable. Their prompt support and warm, friendly attitude really stood out and set the tone for an excellent experience. The rest of the staff were just as courteous and helpful. A big thank you to the entire front office team for making my stay so memorable. Highly recommended!

text.text:
Writing the review after staying for 11 days...
Rooms :
Rooms are good... They are just good, a lot smaller than what I had expected and don't feel worthy for the amount you pay to stay at the hotel... They are not that luxurious.

Service :
Room service : The treatment at the hotel is good. The room cleaning service is fine. The hospitality is really well managed. All the feedback is well considered and made sure that they are followed well and respected.

Laundry Service : The laundry and pressing are the worst services, there are high chances of clothes getting spoiled after the wash and pressing... I lost 2 of my t-shirts.

Complimentary pickup and drop-off to office is very well managed and right on-time always.

Food :
Best for Breakfast - Idli, Poha, Fruits... Parathas and Dosas from the live counter are served hot and taste authentic. English breakfast option is also made available and croissant 🥐, beans, scrambled eggs, cakes and lot other options are available.
Best for In Room Dining - Peas masala, Dhal Tadka, Panner tandoori are served well and taste great Babycorn pepper dry (not in the menu) but the chef custom made this for me and it was great.

Sathyam, one of the hotel staffs is a very good person who treats you well, does his job professionally well.

text.text:
I had a great experience during my stay at Radisson Blu. The rooms are clean and well-maintained. The breakfast buffet is extensive, offering a wide range of cuisines along with a delightful live counter menu. What impressed me most was their willingness to accommodate our requests and prepare dishes even if they weren’t part of the regular menu. The service throughout the stay was also excellent. A big thank you to all the staff members for their warm hospitality and excellent service—special thanks to Nirmala for making excellent tea, Dhamji for his attentive service, and Suraj for keeping the room spotless and well-serviced. A big thank you to all the staff members for their warm hospitality and excellent service—special thanks to Nirmala, Trishna for making excellent tea, Dhamji for his attentive service, Suraj for keeping the room spotless and well-serviced, and Siddhi at the reception for her friendly and helpful assistance.

Highly recommended!

Guests say this hotel offers spacious and clean rooms, a delicious breakfast buffet with a wide variety of options, and a great dining experience at the Carmine restaurant. They also highlight the friendly and helpful staff, particularly the housekeeping team, who provide excellent service.

Some reviews mention the customer service can be inconsistent.

Exceptional Luxury and Unmatched Hospitality at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune

From the moment we arrived at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune, I was immersed in an experience of sheer luxury and impeccable hospitality. The check-in process was seamless, and the staff made me feel welcome with their warm, personalized service. Every detail of the hotel exudes sophistication, from the stunning interiors to the elegantly designed rooms.

The level of comfort provided in the rooms is simply unparalleled, offering breathtaking views and every amenity you could dream of. Dining at their world-class restaurants was another highlight, with exquisite cuisine that truly elevates the entire stay.

Especial mention to Somesh who took care of me and my family during our dineouts .

What sets this hotel apart is the attention to detail and the staff’s dedication to ensuring every guest’s experience is memorable. Whether you're at the resturant, enjoying a spa treatment, or simply taking in the opulence of the surroundings, you are guaranteed an extraordinary experience.

The Ritz-Carlton, Pune is not just a hotel; it’s a destination that redefines luxury and hospitality. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for an unforgettable stay.

text.text:
The JW Marriott on Senapati Bapat Road is an exquisite 5-star establishment that leaves no stone unturned in delivering a lavish and memorable experience to its guests. The rooms here are a true testament to luxury, combining elegant design with modern amenities. Guests can expect spacious and well-appointed accommodations that provide a comfortable haven after a day of exploring the city or attending meetings.

The services offered at this hotel are nothing short of exceptional. The staff’s attention to detail and commitment to making each guest feel valued is truly commendable. From the moment you step into the lobby, you’ll be greeted with warmth and efficiency. The concierge is always ready to assist with any requests, whether it’s arranging transportation, suggesting local attractions, or catering to specific needs. The housekeeping staff maintains the rooms impeccably, ensuring a pristine environment throughout your stay.

When it comes to dining, the JW Marriott offers a gastronomic journey that’s bound to delight even the most discerning palates. The range of dining options is impressive, with each restaurant offering a unique culinary experience. From indulging in authentic Indian flavors at one venue to savoring international cuisines at another, the variety caters to diverse tastes. The quality of the food is consistently high, and the presentation is a treat for the eyes as well as the taste buds.

Breakfast at the JW Marriott is a highlight for many guests. The spread is extensive, featuring a delectable assortment of fresh fruits, pastries, cereals, and cooked-to-order options. Whether you’re in the mood for a hearty breakfast or a light start to the day, the hotel’s breakfast offerings have you covered.

In conclusion, the JW Marriott on Senapati Bapat Road, Pune, offers a truly exceptional experience in terms of rooms, services, and dining. The luxurious accommodations, impeccable services, and diverse food options combine to create a stay that is both comfortable and memorable.

text.text:
My stay at JW Marriott Hotel Pune was nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment I entered, the grand ambiance and warm hospitality made me feel special. The rooms are spacious, luxurious, and offer stunning views of the city. The interiors blend modern elegance with comfort beautifully.

The dining options are truly world-class, with an impressive variety of cuisines. Paasha, their rooftop restaurant, offered not just delicious food but a breathtaking view of Pune’s skyline. The breakfast spread was equally delightful, with both Indian and international options.

The staff was extremely courteous, well-trained, and attentive. Whether it was the concierge or housekeeping, the service was consistently top-notch. The spa and wellness facilities added an extra layer of relaxation to the experience.

Overall, JW Marriott Pune delivers the perfect blend of comfort, class, and care. A must-visit for anyone seeking luxury in the heart of the city.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Conrad Pune and it was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I stepped into the elegant lobby, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a sense of luxury that permeated throughout my entire stay.

The rooms were exquisitely appointed, offering a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. The attention to detail in the design and amenities provided a true sense of indulgence. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep, and the well-appointed workspace allowed me to stay productive during my business trip.

The dining options at Conrad Pune are second to none. From the sumptuous breakfast buffet to the delectable dishes at the fine dining restaurant, every meal was a culinary delight. The variety and quality of the cuisine truly exceeded my expectations.

The hotel staff demonstrated exceptional professionalism and courtesy throughout my stay. They were always attentive to my needs and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. The level of service provided by the team at Conrad Pune truly sets them apart.

The hotel's amenities, including the well-equipped fitness center and the serene spa, provided opportunities for relaxation and rejuvenation. The attention to detail in every aspect of the hotel's offerings is truly commendable.

Conrad Pune's central location made it convenient for both business and leisure activities in the city. The seamless check-in and check-out process further added to the overall positive experience.

In conclusion, my stay at Conrad Pune was nothing short of exceptional. The combination of luxurious accommodations, outstanding dining options, impeccable service, and convenient location make it a top choice for both business and leisure travelers. I highly recommend Conrad Pune for an unforgettable stay in the city.

text.text:
I had the pleasure of staying at the luxurious Conrad Pune, and I was thoroughly impressed by its exceptional infrastructure and prime location!

The hotel's infrastructure is truly world-class, with sleek, modern architecture and beautifully landscaped gardens. The moment you step into the lobby, you're greeted by the stunning décor and warm, inviting atmosphere. The rooms are spacious, elegantly furnished, and equipped with all the amenities you'd expect from a luxury hotel.

What's more, Conrad Pune boasts an unbeatable location, situated just 2 km away from Pune Railway Station. This makes it an ideal choice for business travelers and tourists alike, offering easy access to the city's major attractions and transportation hubs.

Whether you're in Pune for business or leisure, Conrad Pune's exceptional infrastructure and convenient location make it the perfect choice for a luxurious and hassle-free stay.

Recommended for for Luxury travelers, business executives, and anyone seeking a high-end hotel experience

text.text:
The Sheraton Grand Pune is a luxurious hotel located in the vibrant city of Pune, India. This upscale establishment offers a blend of modern amenities and elegant design, making it an ideal choice for both business travelers and vacationers. The hotel features spacious and well-appointed rooms, furnished with contemporary decor and equipped with essential amenities. Guests can enjoy stunning views of the cityscape or the lush greenery surrounding the hotel.

One of the highlights of the Sheraton Grand Pune is its exceptional dining options. The hotel boasts multiple restaurants and bars, serving a variety of cuisines, from traditional Indian dishes to international fare. The buffet breakfast is especially noteworthy, offering a wide range of fresh and delicious items to cater to diverse tastes.

The hotel also provides excellent facilities for business events, including well-equipped meeting rooms and banquet halls, making it a popular choice for corporate gatherings. Additionally, the Sheraton Grand features a luxurious spa, a fitness center, and a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, ensuring guests can unwind and rejuvenate during their stay.

The location of the hotel is another advantage, situated near key attractions, shopping areas, and corporate offices. The attentive and friendly staff further enhances the experience, providing top-notch service and hospitality.

Overall, the Sheraton Grand Pune stands out for its luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and extensive facilities. Whether you're in Pune for business or leisure, this hotel offers a memorable stay with a commitment to excellence, making it a highly recommended choice for travelers.

text.text:
Our stay at Amanora The Fern was nothing short of magical, a night that will forever be etched in our hearts as the best of our lives. The service was impeccable, delivered with such genuine warmth and attentiveness that it felt like the staff were personally invested in making our moment unforgettable. They went above and beyond, surprising us with a bottle of chilled champagne and two elegant glasses as per our special request, and the beautifully decorated bed was a touching masterpiece that made our hearts skip a beat. Every interaction with the team was infused with kindness, transforming our stay into the perfect start to a new chapter.

The food was an absolute delight, elevating our experience to new heights. The chicken stroganoff was a creamy, savory triumph, perfectly balanced and bursting with flavor in every bite. The hot chocolate was a warm, indulgent hug in a mug, rich and comforting, exactly what we needed to cozy up our evening. The rasmalai was divine—soft, spongy, and soaked in a delicately sweet saffron-infused milk that melted in our mouths. And the scoop of vanilla ice cream? Silky, classic, and the perfect sweet note to end our meal. Each dish was crafted with care, making every bite a celebration of taste and texture.

Our room, with its stunning view of the vibrant boulevard, was the ideal backdrop to this unforgettable night. Amanora The Fern didn’t just provide a stay; they created a memory we’ll never let slip from our minds. To the exceptional team, thank you for your outstanding service, culinary brilliance, and for making our night so extraordinarily special. We’ll return, not just for the luxury, but for the love and care you pour into every detail.

Novotel Pune, one of the finest business hotels in the city that celebrates life, accentuates every occasion with zeal making it ideal for both- business trips & stay-cations within the city. The hotel offers 311 ergonomically designed rooms including suites, 4 dining options serving global cuisine & 11,000 sq ft of banqueting space with an elegantly designed divisible ballroom accommodating up to 300 guests and 6 Meeting Rooms with a capacity of 10-60 guests.

The hotel's plush ambience, various dinning options, bar accessibility, fitness centre, outdoor swimming pool & kid's play area make it a perfect get-away destination. It is strategically located in Viman Nagar only 3 kms away from the airport.

text.text:
This strategically situated hotel in Pune, conveniently near both the business district and the airport, boasts a most agreeable swimming pool, a restorative spa, and an excellent dining establishment offering both Asian and Indian fare — the supper being truly delicious. Yet, I must confess, the morning repast did suffer from a paucity of fresh fruits, and to offer nothing but watermelon juice as the only option in the morning is, for a gentleman, a touch uninspired.

Service throughout the establishment is attentive and courteous, from the front desk to the diligent housekeeping and restaurant staff, all comporting themselves with admirable professionalism. A particular word of praise is due to the ever-smiling ladies in charge of welcoming guests at the breakfast buffet, who greet one each morning with such warmth and grace as to brighten the start of the day.

The chamber assigned to me was impeccably clean and maintained with the utmost care by the estimable housekeeping staff. Nonetheless, I find myself compelled to highlight a shortcoming in the laundry service, which, on occasion, returned my garments no sooner than three days post collection. For a gentleman, the inability to array oneself in a properly coordinated shirt, cravat, and tailcoat is no mere inconvenience, but a most grievous affair indeed.

A special encomium is due to the 'boss' of the Fuzion bar, Mr. Ganesh, whose evening cocktails are nothing short of masterful, delighting both palate and spirit.
I must also commend the recent opening of the SOAK poolside bar, where one may enjoy a drink or a light meal in the afternoon or evening, attended by an especially kind and thoughtful staff — all while basking in the view of the pool’s tranquil waters.

Exceptional Service at Lemon Tree Premier, Pune

I recently stayed at the Lemon Tree Premier in Pune, and I must say, the experience was outstanding from start to finish. The hotel’s facilities were impeccable, and the atmosphere was both welcoming and professional.

However, what truly made my stay memorable was the exceptional service provided by the staff. I would like to take a moment to recognize a few individuals who went above and beyond to ensure my experience was perfect:
•	Joseph from the Guest Relations Department: His warm demeanor, attentiveness, and ability to address every concern with efficiency truly enhanced my stay. He is an asset to the hotel.
•	Preeti and Priya from the breakfast restaurant: Their professionalism, friendly service, and attention to detail during breakfast hours were impressive. They made mornings a delight with their positive attitude and excellent hospitality.

The dedication and hard work of these employees are a testament to the high standards upheld by the Lemon Tree Premier. I hope the management recognizes their outstanding contributions and rewards them accordingly.

I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Pune and look forward to staying here again on my next trip.

The rooms were impeccably clean, spacious, and well-appointed with everything needed for a comfortable stay. Every detail, from the bedding to the amenities, reflected the hotel’s high standards.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Blue diamond, Pune. From the moment I stepped into the lobby until the day of my departure, my experience at this hotel was nothing short of exceptional.

The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and Neha at the front desk welcomed us warmly. She provided me with all the necessary information about the hotel's amenities, dining options, and local attractions. The staff's professionalism and friendliness were consistent throughout my stay, making me feel valued as a guest. They also upgraded us to the Seleqtions suite which we felt was a great gesture.

The Suite was simply stunning! It was spacious, elegantly decorated, and equipped with modern amenities. The comfortable bed ensured a restful night's sleep and the room's cleanliness and attention to detail were impeccable, a true testament to the hotel's commitment to excellence.

The location of Blue Diamond couldn't be better. It was conveniently situated in Koregaon Park near major attractions and within walking distance of shopping districts and local restaurants. I appreciated being able to explore the city easily and return to the comfort of the hotel without any hassle.

The buffet was also great with a wide spread. In summary, my stay at Blue Diamond was nothing short of extraordinary. The combination of excellent service, luxurious accommodations, delectable dining options, and prime location made it a memorable experience. Ill recommend this hotel if you are visiting Pune.

text.text:
My recent stay at Blue Diamond, Pune - IHCL SeleQtions, was a delightful escape into luxury. From the moment I entered the hotel, its contemporary design and meticulous attention to detail set the stage for an exceptional experience.

The Deluxe Suite, my chosen abode, was a haven of comfort and sophistication. The spacious layout, plush furnishings, and panoramic city views created a memorable retreat. The bed, enveloped in comfort, ensured a restful night, while the well-appointed bathroom with premium amenities added to the sense of opulence.

Dining at Blue Diamond was a culinary journey. Whispering Bamboo, the fine-dining Asian restaurant, offered exquisite flavors and impeccable presentation, while Latitude, the all-day dining restaurant, impressed with a diverse breakfast spread.

Service at Blue Diamond was exemplary. The staff, consistently professional and welcoming, made every interaction a pleasure. From insightful local recommendations by the concierge to the unwavering commitment of the housekeeping team, the service was impeccable.

The wellness facilities, including the well-equipped fitness center and rejuvenating spa, complemented the overall experience. The spa provided a tranquil escape, leaving me refreshed after a day exploring Pune.

Centrally located, Blue Diamond offers easy access to key attractions, shopping districts, and business centers. Whether for business or leisure, the hotel's prime location enhances its appeal.

The seamless blend of elegance, comfort, and top-notch service makes it an excellent choice for discerning travelers. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel for a luxurious and memorable stay in Pune and look forward to returning on future visits.

text.text:
Indulge in Elegance: The Ultimate Stay at Crowne Plaza Pune

Tucked away in the heart of Pune, Crowne Plaza is a sanctuary of comfort and sophistication. My recent stay there was nothing short of spectacular, marked by the seamless blend of luxury, culinary excellence, and exceptional service. The spacious rooms welcomed me with breathtaking views of the city skyline, creating a tranquil retreat away from the hustle and bustle below. Every corner of the room was thoughtfully designed, from the plush bedding to the modern amenities, making it the perfect place to unwind after a long day.

The experience began with the incredibly efficient front office team, whose professionalism and warm approach made check-in a breeze. My dining journey kicked off at Mosaic, a multi-cuisine outlet that truly lives up to its reputation. From Asian delicacies to classic European dishes and Indian favorites, every meal was a delightful explosion of flavors. The skilled chefs clearly know their craft, presenting each dish with finesse and a touch of creativity that made dining at Mosaic feel like a global culinary tour.

Evviva Sky Lounge, perched high above the city, quickly became my favorite spot. The panoramic views combined with the latest music set the perfect backdrop for a relaxing evening. The bar staff were nothing short of magicians, crafting cocktails that were as visually stunning as they were delicious. The atmosphere was vibrant, yet intimate—a rare balance that made Evviva feel like a hidden gem in the sky.

The food and beverage service team consistently impressed me with their attentiveness and deep knowledge of the menu, elevating the dining experience at every turn. It was clear that service excellence is a core value at Crowne Plaza, and it shines through in every interaction.

I also had the opportunity to explore the hotel’s banqueting facilities, which were elegantly designed and equipped to handle everything from intimate gatherings to large celebrations. The level of detail put into each event space reflected the hotel’s commitment to quality, making it an ideal choice for any occasion.

For a bit of relaxation, the spa offered a much-needed escape. The therapists guided me through a rejuvenating experience that left me feeling refreshed and recharged. It’s an oasis within the hotel, providing a perfect balance of tranquility and luxury. The fitness room, adjacent to the spa, was well-equipped and provided the perfect setting for a quick workout, allowing me to keep up with my fitness routine effortlessly.

Navigating the hotel was made even smoother thanks to the quick and efficient valet and security staff, who were always on hand to assist with a level of service that was both courteous and professional.

Crowne Plaza Pune is more than just a hotel—it’s a complete experience that caters to every need with style and grace. From the enchanting views and luxurious rooms to the top-notch dining and impeccable service, every aspect of my stay was thoughtfully curated, making it a place I’ll eagerly return to whenever I’m in Pune.

Thanks to the entire team. From expert and experienced GM to normal Bus Boy working for Crowne, each and everyone is there to make your visit unforgettable.

Manav Kaushik

Crowne Plaza Pune is a luxurious hotel that offers a blend of comfort and sophistication, making it a popular choice for both business travelers and tourists. The property is well-located, providing easy access to key areas of the city, including the Pune International Airport and major business districts.

Upon entering the hotel, guests are greeted by a stylish and modern lobby that sets the tone for the overall experience. The rooms are spacious and elegantly designed, equipped with all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay, including plush bedding, high-speed internet, and flat-screen TVs. The hotel also offers stunning views of the city, enhancing the overall ambiance.

Dining options at Crowne Plaza Pune are impressive, with multiple restaurants serving a variety of cuisines. The breakfast buffet is particularly noteworthy, featuring an extensive selection of dishes that cater to different tastes. The staff is attentive and professional, ensuring that guests feel welcomed and well taken care of throughout their stay.

For those looking to unwind, the hotel features a well-equipped fitness center, a spa, and a beautiful outdoor pool, providing ample opportunities for relaxation. The Crowne Plaza also has excellent facilities for meetings and events, making it a preferred choice for conferences and business gatherings.

Overall, Crowne Plaza Pune combines luxury, convenience, and exceptional service, making it a top-notch choice for anyone visiting the city.

text.text:
Ten on Ten for
Hotel, Service, rooms, food and Hospitality. Ramee Grand Hotel has now at a very special place in our hearts.
Just wanna share this experience with all of you.
Me and my mom were staying in Ramee Grand for third time and somehow mom got with an accident and required Femur bone surgery. Entire hotel staff was like my support system that day as I was alone with her. They have made all the required arrangements like stretcher, ambulance, appointment in hospital etc. The main part was, my kids below 10 were with us and I left them at hotel alone and  staff taken good care and complete responsibility of both of them till my family reaches us.
After that episode too we stayed many times in Hotel and they really given us special attention, asking about mom and all.
Special thanks to Nilesh Sir and Avinash bhaiyya for their great hospitality and homely concerns towards all.
We are now life time customers of Hotel Ramee Grand for sure.
Thank you so much Team Ramee Grand.

text.text:
We stayed at the Sheraton for 4N / 5D, and the experience of nothing short of Amazing. The hotel is located at one of the city's most prominent locations. It is pretty well connected with Pune Airport and the railway station.

The hotel has a grand lobby, with one side having a ballroom and the other side having "The Eatery, " one of the 3 restaurants the hotel has. The buffet breakfast is served here only in the morning till 10.30 a.m. in the morning. The hotel has two lifts. Our room was located on the 8th floor, and the view from the top was splendid, facing the pool area.

The room in itself was luxurious and well maintained. It contained all the necessary amenities, including a steam iron and an ironing board, tea/coffee maker, etc. The lighting and furniture in the room were appropriate, and the beds and all were extremely comfortable.

Coming to the breakfast, it was a sumptuous spread of food from across the length and breadth of the country. Prominent items included Puri bhaji, Misal Pav, 2 -3 types of Idli, medu vada, potato wedges, grilled tomatoes, a variety of cakes, milkshakes, fruit juices, etc. I really loved the attitude of the restaurant staff. Kudos to Protima and Regina for the impeccable service they provided to us during our breakfast at the eatery on all 4 days. You should definitely have more such staff members.

However, I have rated 4 stars due to a few significant reasons. First, the initial room that was assigned had a non-functional AC. It made living impossible in that room. And upon inquiring with the staff, they took more than 2 and half hours to change the room that too after 50 calls. And it was entirely the reception staff who delayed this thing. In the new room that we were shifted to though AC was functioning, the dim lights and one part of the wall lights were non-functional. Also, though the breakfast was great, it was repeated even in just 4 days. These 2 issues I faced were the primary reasons to rate overall 4 stars.

But the overall stay was great. The restaurant staff was impeccable in providing service, rooms were neat, clean, and luxurious. If you are looking for a luxurious hotel, Sheraton is definitely one place you should look into in Pune.

"I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Radisson Blu Pune Kharadi, and it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality by akansha. The check-in process was seamless, and she was incredibly courteous and attentive throughout my stay.

The room was spacious, modern, and impeccably clean, providing a perfect retreat after a long day of exploring Pune. The comfortable bed ensured a restful night's sleep, and the amenities provided added an extra touch of luxury to my stay.

Overall, I highly recommend the Radisson Blu Pune Kharadi to anyone looking for a comfortable, luxurious, and conveniently located hotel in Pune. The impeccable service, modern amenities, and attention to detail truly set it apart from the rest."
